text:
Message 841 of 4024
SAAS tuition is 48k before study skills.
Putting Adrian there is a significant commitment of resources that I am uncomfortable with not knowing your plans for job etc.
You never responded regarding if I should reach out or not but he is asking and said you told him you did so already.
Please let’s align on next steps. Ball is in your court.
Sent:01/30/2024 at 07:04 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/30/2024 at 07:27 AM)
Subject:SAAS/Adrian
Message 842 of 4024
I would like to have the Lugg sent to my house. But, I don’t need more junk. You sent actual bags of trash last time instead of the list of documented
things we agreed to move.
The text messages is accurate. We have family plans, Christine. Please go into yours and you can see what is tracked for yourself. This is a service. This
is not spying. I keep explaining that.
If everyone wants to pay for their own accounts that is fine. Phone, internet, Netflix, Xbox, office. We did this as a family till you did your thing. That
is normal. Please don’t present it as otherwise.
If everyone chooses to be thier own person, and ignore that we are a family, that is ok. But i will not be expecting to pay the bills for that. It is an
unnatural act. If you are not family, you are not.
The game suggested is very real. I am trying to teach you all about your digital footprint. It is not spying, like the way schools offer internet safety
courses. Knowledge is actually helpful to us all.
And per your last line. You are mixing metaphors. Please stop! You can see phone calls and texts. But who wants to? Who cares? Please see ChatGPT
explaining this to you to educate yourself.
Can we PLEASE facilitate a safe discussion so I can do as i have offered. Back and forth here is useless. It is straightforward if you don’t mix and
match things to try and play “gotcha”. I can help you.
Each data point is very specific. Acting like this is one big tracking report is inaccurate. Please let me help you understand what you are mixing up. A
single whiteboard session will do. I promise you.
Please quit putting your head in the sand and making this worse. Let’s stop. Explain. Ask questions. Make decisions. This is simply not nefarious.
Sent:01/30/2024 at 07:27 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/30/2024 at 08:20 AM)
Subject:Re: Friday Practice
